00029 class admin_logon
00030 {
00031     protected $username = '';
00032     protected $password = '';
00033     public $real_name = '';
00034     public $ip_check = '';
00035 
00036 
00043     public function __construct($str_username, $str_password)
00044     {
00045         $this->username = $str_username;
00046         $this->password = $str_password;
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00056     public function adminValid($obj_db)
00057     {
00058         $_user_q = $obj_db->query("SELECT
00059             u.user_id,
00060             u.username,
00061             u.realname,
00062             u.groups
00063             FROM user AS u
00064             WHERE u.username='".$obj_db->escape_string(trim($this->username))."'
00065                 AND u.passwd=MD5('".$obj_db->escape_string(trim($this->password))."')");
00066 
00067         // error check
00068         if ($obj_db->error) {
00069             echo '<div style="border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000; padding: 5px; margin: 3px;">'.__('Error authenticating user and password to database').'</div>';
00070             return false;
00071         }
00072 
00073         // check if the user exist in database
00074         if ($_user_q->num_rows < 1) {
00075             return false;
00076         } else {
00077             // if the ip checking is enabled
00078             if ($this->ip_check) {
00079                 if ($this->ip_check != $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']) {
00080                     return false;
00081                 }
00082             }
00083 
00084             $_user_d = $_user_q->fetch_assoc();
00085             $this->real_name = $_user_d['realname'];
00086             // fill all sessions var
00087             $_SESSION['uid'] = $_user_d['user_id'];
00088             $_SESSION['uname'] = $_user_d['username'];
00089             $_SESSION['realname'] = $_user_d['realname'];
00090             if (!empty($_user_d['groups'])) {
00091                 $_SESSION['groups'] = @unserialize($_user_d['groups']);
00092                 // fetch group privileges
00093                 foreach ($_SESSION['groups'] as $group_id) {
00094                     $_priv_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT ga.*,mdl.module_path FROM group_access AS ga
00095                         LEFT JOIN mst_module AS mdl ON ga.module_id=mdl.module_id WHERE ga.group_id='.$group_id);
00096                     while ($_priv_d = $_priv_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00097                         // init privileges
00098                         // $_SESSION['priv'][$_priv_d['module_path']]['r'] = false;
00099                         // $_SESSION['priv'][$_priv_d['module_path']]['w'] = false;
00100                         if ($_priv_d['r']) {
00101                             $_SESSION['priv'][$_priv_d['module_path']]['r'] = true;
00102                         }
00103                         if ($_priv_d['w']) {
00104                             $_SESSION['priv'][$_priv_d['module_path']]['w'] = true;
00105                         }
00106                     }
00107                 }
00108             } else {
00109                 $_SESSION['groups'] = null;
00110             }
00111 
00112             $_SESSION['logintime'] = time();
00113             // session vars needed by some application modules
00114             $_SESSION['temp_loan'] = array();
00115             $_SESSION['biblioAuthor'] = array();
00116             $_SESSION['biblioTopic'] = array();
00117             $_SESSION['biblioAttach'] = array();
00118 
00119             // load holiday data from database
00120             $_holiday_dayname_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT holiday_dayname FROM holiday WHERE holiday_date IS NULL');
00121             $_SESSION['holiday_dayname'] = array();
00122             while ($_holiday_dayname_d = $_holiday_dayname_q->fetch_row()) {
00123                 $_SESSION['holiday_dayname'][] = $_holiday_dayname_d[0];
00124             }
00125 
00126             $_holiday_date_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT holiday_date FROM holiday WHERE holiday_date IS NOT NULL
00127                 ORDER BY holiday_date DESC LIMIT 365');
00128             $_SESSION['holiday_date'] = array();
00129             while ($_holiday_date_d = $_holiday_date_q->fetch_row()) {
00130                 $_SESSION['holiday_date'][$_holiday_date_d[0]] = $_holiday_date_d[0];
00131             }
00132 
00133             // save md5sum of  current application path
00134             $_SESSION['checksum'] = md5($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin');
00135 
00136             // update the last login time
00137             $obj_db->query("UPDATE user SET last_login='".date("Y-m-d H:i:s")."',
00138                 last_login_ip='".$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']."'
00139                 WHERE user_id=".$_user_d['user_id']);
00140 
00141             return true;
00142         }
00143 
00144         return false;
00145     }
00146 }
